TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeleteMode extends System.Enum

span.para: MoveToDeletedItems 和 HardDelete 选项是事务性的这意味着 web 服务调用完成时，数据库已移至已删除邮件文件夹的项目或从 Exchange 数据库中永久删除项目。

SoftDelete 选项的不同的目标版本的 Exchange Server 的工作方式。Exchange 2007 SoftDelete 在表示项目将移至 Exchange 数据库的项目上设置位转储程序文件夹的将来确定的时间。启动与 Exchange 2010，包括 Exchange Online 的 Exchange 版本 SoftDelete 立即移动到的项转储程序。SoftDelete 不为文件夹删除选项。项目和文件夹的 SoftDelete 遍历搜索不会返回任何结果。

The MoveToDeletedItems and HardDelete options are transactional, which means that by the time a web service call completes, the database has moved the item to the Deleted Items folder or permanently removed the item from the Exchange database.

The SoftDelete option works differently for different target versions of Exchange Server. SoftDelete for Exchange 2007 sets a bit on the item that indicates to the Exchange database that the item will be moved to the dumpster folder at an indeterminate time in the future. SoftDelete for versions of Exchange starting with Exchange 2010, including Exchange Online, immediately moves the item to the dumpster. SoftDelete is not an option for folder deletion. SoftDelete traversal searches for items and folders will not return any results.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.DeleteMode HardDelete = int32(0)

summary.span: 将被永久删除项目或文件夹。

span.span: The item or folder will be permanently deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.DeleteMode MoveToDeletedItems = int32(2)

summary.span: 文件夹的项目将被移动到邮箱的已删除邮件文件夹。

span.span: The item or folder will be moved to the mailbox's Deleted Items folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.DeleteMode SoftDelete = int32(1)

summary.span: 项目或文件夹将移至转储程序。

span.span: The item or folder will be moved to the dumpster.

summary.span: 中项目和文件夹转储程序可以恢复。

span.span: Items and folders in the dumpster can be recovered.
